00069 ModifierTypeInfo *modifierType_getInfo(ModifierType type)
00070 {
00071     static ModifierTypeInfo *types[NUM_MODIFIER_TYPES]= {NULL};
00072     static int types_init = 1;
00073 
00074     if (types_init) {
00075         modifier_type_init(types); /* MOD_utils.c */
00076         types_init= 0;
00077     }
00078 
00079     /* type unsigned, no need to check < 0 */
00080     if (type < NUM_MODIFIER_TYPES && types[type]->name[0] != '\0') {
00081         return types[type];
00082     }
00083     else {
00084         return NULL;
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 /***/
00089 
00090 ModifierData *modifier_new(int type)
00091 {
00092     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(type);
00093     ModifierData *md = MEM_callocN(mti->structSize, mti->structName);
00094     
00095     /* note, this name must be made unique later */
00096     BLI_strncpy(md->name, mti->name, sizeof(md->name));
00097 
00098     md->type = type;
00099     md->mode = eModifierMode_Realtime
00100             | eModifierMode_Render | eModifierMode_Expanded;
00101 
00102     if (mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode)
00103         md->mode |= eModifierMode_Editmode;
00104 
00105     if (mti->initData) mti->initData(md);
00106 
00107     return md;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void modifier_free(ModifierData *md) 
00111 {
00112     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00113 
00114     if (mti->freeData) mti->freeData(md);
00115     if (md->error) MEM_freeN(md->error);
00116 
00117     MEM_freeN(md);
00118 }

00120 void modifier_unique_name(ListBase *modifiers, ModifierData *md)
00121 {
00122     if (modifiers && md) {
00123         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00124         
00125         BLI_uniquename(modifiers, md, mti->name, '.', offsetof(ModifierData, name), sizeof(md->name));
00126     }
00127 }

00129 int modifier_dependsOnTime(ModifierData *md) 
00130 {
00131     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00132 
00133     return mti->dependsOnTime && mti->dependsOnTime(md);
00134 }

00136 int modifier_supportsMapping(ModifierData *md)
00137 {
00138     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00139 
00140     return (mti->type==eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform ||
00141             (mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping));
00142 }
00143 
00144 int modifier_isPreview(ModifierData *md)
00145 {
00146     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00147 
00148     if (!(mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_UsesPreview))
00149         return FALSE;
00150 
00151     if (md->mode & eModifierMode_Realtime)
00152         return TRUE;
00153 
00154     return FALSE;
00155 }

00157 ModifierData *modifiers_findByType(Object *ob, ModifierType type)
00158 {
00159     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00160 
00161     for (; md; md=md->next)
00162         if (md->type==type)
00163             break;
00164 
00165     return md;
00166 }

00168 ModifierData *modifiers_findByName(Object *ob, const char *name)
00169 {
00170     return BLI_findstring(&(ob->modifiers), name, offsetof(ModifierData, name));
00171 }

00173 void modifiers_clearErrors(Object *ob)
00174 {
00175     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00176     /* int qRedraw = 0; */
00177 
00178     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00179         if (md->error) {
00180             MEM_freeN(md->error);
00181             md->error = NULL;
00182 
00183             /* qRedraw = 1; */
00184         }
00185     }
00186 }

00188 void modifiers_foreachObjectLink(Object *ob, ObjectWalkFunc walk,
00189                  void *userData)
00190 {
00191     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00192 
00193     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00194         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00195 
00196         if (mti->foreachObjectLink)
00197             mti->foreachObjectLink(md, ob, walk, userData);
00198     }
00199 }
00200 
00201 void modifiers_foreachIDLink(Object *ob, IDWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00202 {
00203     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00204 
00205     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00206         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00207 
00208         if (mti->foreachIDLink) mti->foreachIDLink(md, ob, walk, userData);
00209         else if (mti->foreachObjectLink) {
00210             /* each Object can masquerade as an ID, so this should be OK */
00211             ObjectWalkFunc fp = (ObjectWalkFunc)walk;
00212             mti->foreachObjectLink(md, ob, fp, userData);
00213         }
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 void modifiers_foreachTexLink(Object *ob, TexWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00218 {
00219     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00220 
00221     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00222         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00223 
00224         if (mti->foreachTexLink)
00225             mti->foreachTexLink(md, ob, walk, userData);
00226     }
00227 }

00229 void modifier_copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00230 {
00231     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00232 
00233     target->mode = md->mode;
00234 
00235     if (mti->copyData)
00236         mti->copyData(md, target);
00237 }

00239 int modifier_couldBeCage(struct Scene *scene, ModifierData *md)
00240 {
00241     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00242 
00243     md->scene= scene;
00244 
00245     return (    (md->mode & eModifierMode_Realtime) &&
00246             (md->mode & eModifierMode_Editmode) &&
00247             (!mti->isDisabled || !mti->isDisabled(md, 0)) &&
00248             modifier_supportsMapping(md));  
00249 }

00251 int modifier_sameTopology(ModifierData *md)
00252 {
00253     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00254     return ELEM3(mti->type, eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform, eModifierTypeType_Nonconstructive,
00255                  eModifierTypeType_NonGeometrical);
00256 }

00258 int modifier_nonGeometrical(ModifierData *md)
00259 {
00260     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00261     return (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_NonGeometrical);
00262 }
00263 
00264 void modifier_setError(ModifierData *md, const char *format, ...)
00265 {
00266     char buffer[512];
00267     va_list ap;
00268 
00269     va_start(ap, format);
00270     vsnprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), format, ap);
00271     va_end(ap);
00272     buffer[sizeof(buffer) - 1]= '\0';
00273 
00274     if (md->error)
00275         MEM_freeN(md->error);
00276 
00277     md->error = BLI_strdup(buffer);
00278 
00279 }
00280 
00281 /* used for buttons, to find out if the 'draw deformed in editmode' option is
00282  * there
00283  * 
00284  * also used in transform_conversion.c, to detect CrazySpace [tm] (2nd arg
00285  * then is NULL) 
00286  * also used for some mesh tools to give warnings
00287  */
00288 int modifiers_getCageIndex(struct Scene *scene, Object *ob, int *lastPossibleCageIndex_r, int virtual_)
00289 {
00290     ModifierData *md = (virtual_)? modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob): ob->modifiers.first;
00291     int i, cageIndex = -1;
00292 
00293     if (lastPossibleCageIndex_r) {
00294         /* ensure the value is initialized */
00295         *lastPossibleCageIndex_r= -1;
00296     }
00297 
00298     /* Find the last modifier acting on the cage. */
00299     for (i=0; md; i++,md=md->next) {
00300         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00301 
00302         md->scene= scene;
00303 
00304         if (!(md->mode & eModifierMode_Realtime)) continue;
00305         if (!(md->mode & eModifierMode_Editmode)) continue;
00306         if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, 0)) continue;
00307         if (!(mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode)) continue;
00308         if (md->mode & eModifierMode_DisableTemporary) continue;
00309 
00310         if (!modifier_supportsMapping(md))
00311             break;
00312 
00313         if (lastPossibleCageIndex_r) *lastPossibleCageIndex_r = i;
00314         if (md->mode & eModifierMode_OnCage)
00315             cageIndex = i;
00316     }
00317 
00318     return cageIndex;
00319 }

00322 int modifiers_isSoftbodyEnabled(Object *ob)
00323 {
00324     ModifierData *md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Softbody);
00325 
00326     return (md && md->mode & (eModifierMode_Realtime | eModifierMode_Render));
00327 }

00329 int modifiers_isClothEnabled(Object *ob)
00330 {
00331     ModifierData *md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Cloth);
00332 
00333     return (md && md->mode & (eModifierMode_Realtime | eModifierMode_Render));
00334 }
00335 
00336 int modifiers_isParticleEnabled(Object *ob)
00337 {
00338     ModifierData *md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_ParticleSystem);
00339 
00340     return (md && md->mode & (eModifierMode_Realtime | eModifierMode_Render));
00341 }
00342 
00343 int modifier_isEnabled(struct Scene *scene, ModifierData *md, int required_mode)
00344 {
00345     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00346 
00347     md->scene= scene;
00348 
00349     if ((md->mode & required_mode) != required_mode) return 0;
00350     if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, required_mode == eModifierMode_Render)) return 0;
00351     if (md->mode & eModifierMode_DisableTemporary) return 0;
00352     if (required_mode & eModifierMode_Editmode)
00353         if (!(mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode)) return 0;
00354     
00355     return 1;
00356 }
00357 
00358 CDMaskLink *modifiers_calcDataMasks(struct Scene *scene, Object *ob, ModifierData *md, CustomDataMask dataMask, int required_mode)
00359 {
00360     CDMaskLink *dataMasks = NULL;
00361     CDMaskLink *curr, *prev;
00362 
00363     /* build a list of modifier data requirements in reverse order */
00364     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00365         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00366 
00367         curr = MEM_callocN(sizeof(CDMaskLink), "CDMaskLink");
00368         
00369         if (modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, required_mode))
00370             if (mti->requiredDataMask)
00371                 curr->mask = mti->requiredDataMask(ob, md);
00372 
00373         /* prepend new datamask */
00374         curr->next = dataMasks;
00375         dataMasks = curr;
00376     }
00377 
00378     /* build the list of required data masks - each mask in the list must
00379      * include all elements of the masks that follow it
00380      *
00381      * note the list is currently in reverse order, so "masks that follow it"
00382      * actually means "masks that precede it" at the moment
00383      */
00384     for (curr = dataMasks, prev = NULL; curr; prev = curr, curr = curr->next) {
00385         if (prev) {
00386             CustomDataMask prev_mask = prev->mask;
00387             CustomDataMask curr_mask = curr->mask;
00388 
00389             curr->mask = curr_mask | prev_mask;
00390         }
00391         else {
00392             CustomDataMask curr_mask = curr->mask;
00393 
00394             curr->mask = curr_mask | dataMask;
00395         }
00396     }
00397 
00398     /* reverse the list so it's in the correct order */
00399     BLI_linklist_reverse((LinkNode**)&dataMasks);
00400 
00401     return dataMasks;
00402 }
00403 
00404 ModifierData *modifiers_getLastPreview(struct Scene *scene, ModifierData *md, int required_mode)
00405 {
00406     ModifierData *tmp_md = NULL;
00407 
00408     if (required_mode != eModifierMode_Realtime)
00409         return tmp_md;
00410 
00411     /* Find the latest modifier in stack generating preview. */
00412     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00413         if (modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, required_mode) && modifier_isPreview(md))
00414             tmp_md = md;
00415     }
00416     return tmp_md;
00417 }
00418 
00419 ModifierData *modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(Object *ob)
00420 {
00421     /* Kinda hacky, but should be fine since we are never
00422      * re-entrant and avoid free hassles.
00423      */
00424     static ArmatureModifierData amd;
00425     static CurveModifierData cmd;
00426     static LatticeModifierData lmd;
00427     static ShapeKeyModifierData smd;
00428     static int init = 1;
00429     ModifierData *md;
00430 
00431     if (init) {
00432         md = modifier_new(eModifierType_Armature);
00433         amd = *((ArmatureModifierData*) md);
00434         modifier_free(md);
00435 
00436         md = modifier_new(eModifierType_Curve);
00437         cmd = *((CurveModifierData*) md);
00438         modifier_free(md);
00439 
00440         md = modifier_new(eModifierType_Lattice);
00441         lmd = *((LatticeModifierData*) md);
00442         modifier_free(md);
00443 
00444         md = modifier_new(eModifierType_ShapeKey);
00445         smd = *((ShapeKeyModifierData*) md);
00446         modifier_free(md);
00447 
00448         amd.modifier.mode |= eModifierMode_Virtual;
00449         cmd.modifier.mode |= eModifierMode_Virtual;
00450         lmd.modifier.mode |= eModifierMode_Virtual;
00451         smd.modifier.mode |= eModifierMode_Virtual;
00452 
00453         init = 0;
00454     }
00455 
00456     md = ob->modifiers.first;
00457 
00458     if (ob->parent) {
00459         if (ob->parent->type==OB_ARMATURE && ob->partype==PARSKEL) {
00460             amd.object = ob->parent;
00461             amd.modifier.next = md;
00462             amd.deformflag= ((bArmature *)(ob->parent->data))->deformflag;
00463             md = &amd.modifier;
00464         }
00465         else if (ob->parent->type==OB_CURVE && ob->partype==PARSKEL) {
00466             cmd.object = ob->parent;
00467             cmd.defaxis = ob->trackflag + 1;
00468             cmd.modifier.next = md;
00469             md = &cmd.modifier;
00470         }
00471         else if (ob->parent->type==OB_LATTICE && ob->partype==PARSKEL) {
00472             lmd.object = ob->parent;
00473             lmd.modifier.next = md;
00474             md = &lmd.modifier;
00475         }
00476     }
00477 
00478     /* shape key modifier, not yet for curves */
00479     if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_MESH, OB_LATTICE) && ob_get_key(ob)) {
00480         if (ob->type == OB_MESH && (ob->shapeflag & OB_SHAPE_EDIT_MODE))
00481             smd.modifier.mode |= eModifierMode_Editmode|eModifierMode_OnCage;
00482         else
00483             smd.modifier.mode &= ~eModifierMode_Editmode|eModifierMode_OnCage;
00484 
00485         smd.modifier.next = md;
00486         md = &smd.modifier;
00487     }
00488 
00489     return md;
00490 }
00491 /* Takes an object and returns its first selected armature, else just its
00492  * armature
00493  * This should work for multiple armatures per object
00494  */
00495 Object *modifiers_isDeformedByArmature(Object *ob)
00496 {
00497     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00498     ArmatureModifierData *amd= NULL;
00499     
00500     /* return the first selected armature, this lets us use multiple armatures */
00501     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00502         if (md->type==eModifierType_Armature) {
00503             amd = (ArmatureModifierData*) md;
00504             if (amd->object && (amd->object->flag & SELECT))
00505                 return amd->object;
00506         }
00507     }
00508     
00509     if (amd) /* if were still here then return the last armature */
00510         return amd->object;
00511     
00512     return NULL;
00513 }
00514 
00515 /* Takes an object and returns its first selected lattice, else just its
00516  * lattice
00517  * This should work for multiple lattics per object
00518  */
00519 Object *modifiers_isDeformedByLattice(Object *ob)
00520 {
00521     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00522     LatticeModifierData *lmd= NULL;
00523     
00524     /* return the first selected lattice, this lets us use multiple lattices */
00525     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00526         if (md->type==eModifierType_Lattice) {
00527             lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00528             if (lmd->object && (lmd->object->flag & SELECT))
00529                 return lmd->object;
00530         }
00531     }
00532     
00533     if (lmd) /* if were still here then return the last lattice */
00534         return lmd->object;
00535     
00536     return NULL;
00537 }

00540 
00541 int modifiers_usesArmature(Object *ob, bArmature *arm)
00542 {
00543     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00544 
00545     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00546         if (md->type==eModifierType_Armature) {
00547             ArmatureModifierData *amd = (ArmatureModifierData*) md;
00548             if (amd->object && amd->object->data==arm) 
00549                 return 1;
00550         }
00551     }
00552 
00553     return 0;
00554 }
00555 
00556 int modifier_isCorrectableDeformed(ModifierData *md)
00557 {
00558     if (md->type==eModifierType_Armature)
00559         return 1;
00560     if (md->type==eModifierType_ShapeKey)
00561         return 1;
00562     
00563     return 0;
00564 }
00565 
00566 int modifiers_isCorrectableDeformed(Object *ob)
00567 {
00568     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00569     
00570     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00571         if (ob->mode==OB_MODE_EDIT && (md->mode & eModifierMode_Editmode)==0);
00572         else 
00573             if (modifier_isCorrectableDeformed(md))
00574                 return 1;
00575     }
00576     return 0;
00577 }
00578 
00579 /* Check whether the given object has a modifier in its stack that uses WEIGHT_MCOL CD layer
00580  * to preview something... Used by DynamicPaint and WeightVG currently. */
00581 int modifiers_isPreview(Object *ob)
00582 {
00583     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00584 
00585     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00586         if (modifier_isPreview(md))
00587             return TRUE;
00588     }
00589 
00590     return FALSE;
00591 }
00592 
00593 int modifiers_indexInObject(Object *ob, ModifierData *md_seek)
00594 {
00595     int i= 0;
00596     ModifierData *md;
00597     
00598     for (md=ob->modifiers.first; (md && md_seek!=md); md=md->next, i++);
00599     if (!md) return -1; /* modifier isn't in the object */
00600     return i;
00601 }
00602 
00603 void modifier_freeTemporaryData(ModifierData *md)
00604 {
00605     if (md->type == eModifierType_Armature) {
00606         ArmatureModifierData *amd= (ArmatureModifierData*)md;
00607 
00608         if (amd->prevCos) {
00609             MEM_freeN(amd->prevCos);
00610             amd->prevCos= NULL;
00611         }
00612     }
00613 }

00615 /* ensure modifier correctness when changing ob->data */
00616 void test_object_modifiers(Object *ob)
00617 {
00618     ModifierData *md;
00619 
00620     /* just multires checked for now, since only multires
00621      * modifies mesh data */
00622 
00623     if (ob->type != OB_MESH) return;
00624 
00625     for (md = ob->modifiers.first; md; md = md->next) {
00626         if (md->type == eModifierType_Multires) {
00627             MultiresModifierData *mmd = (MultiresModifierData*)md;
00628 
00629             multiresModifier_set_levels_from_disps(mmd, ob);
00630         }
00631     }
00632 }
00633 
00634 /* where should this go?, it doesnt fit well anywhere :S - campbell */
00635 
00636 /* elubie: changed this to default to the same dir as the render output
00637  * to prevent saving to C:\ on Windows */
00638 
00639 /* campbell: logic behind this...
00640  *
00641  * - if the ID is from a library, return library path
00642  * - else if the file has been saved return the blend file path.
00643  * - else if the file isn't saved and the ID isn't from a library, return the temp dir.
00644  */
00645 const char *modifier_path_relbase(Object *ob)
00646 {
00647     if (G.relbase_valid || ob->id.lib) {
00648         return ID_BLEND_PATH(G.main, &ob->id);
00649     }
00650     else {
00651         /* last resort, better then using "" which resolves to the current
00652          * working directory */
00653         return BLI_temporary_dir();
00654     }
00655 }
00656 
00657 /* initializes the path with either */
00658 void modifier_path_init(char *path, int path_maxlen, const char *name)
00659 {
00660     /* elubie: changed this to default to the same dir as the render output
00661      * to prevent saving to C:\ on Windows */
